gui module¶

gui.ck_type(filename)¶

Function to check type of file selected

Parameters

filename (string) – The name of the file

Returns

the type of the file

Return type

string

gui.cvt_proc_index(index)¶

function that read the index of the selected process option and translate to method.

Arg:

index(int): image process option index (0,1,2,3)

Returns

‘Histogram Equalization’: process option ‘Contrast Stretching’: process option ‘Log Compression’: process option ‘Invert Image’: process option False(boolean): return false if the index does not present any process options.

Return type

(string)

gui.display_info(ind, act)¶
function that read upload and process

time and image size from json.

Arg:

ind(int): index position of the displayed image in the image list. act(dictionary): the dictionary read from most_recent_post.

Returns

timestamp when the image is uploaded. protime(float): seconds that the image need to process size_a(int): column of the image size_b(int): row of the image

Return type

uptime(string)

gui.file_warning()¶
Create the window that gives the warning message

when the user wrongly select the type of the image(s).

Returns

None

gui.image_display_window(ind, one_history, info)¶

Create the window that can display the original image and the processed image with its histogram.

Returns

None

gui.login_window()¶

The window created for login

If a new user want to log in to the image processor, the input of the id is needed. If this id has existed in the database, the user would be inform in the window. While an old user, who has created the account before, can access the image processor by inputting the id in the box.

Returns

None

gui.main_window(username)¶

This is the main window for the image processor that allows to process image(s) in multiple way.

Parameters

username (string) – The user name of the account.

Returns

None

gui.plotimages(img_raw, img_processed)¶

function that plot the histogram on the display window.

Arg:

img_raw(ndarray): a uint8 array of the original image data received from server img_processed(ndarray): a uint8 array of the processed image data received from server

Returns

an array of image with original and processed image with their corresponding histogram

Return type

hist_img(ndarray)

gui.user_data_window(user_info)¶

Create the window that can visualize the user information

Returns

None
